TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void EventArrivedEventHandler(object sender, EventArrivedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed EventArrivedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub EventArrivedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As EventArrivedEventArgs)
public delegate void EventArrivedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, EventArrivedEventArgs ^ e);
type EventArrivedEventHandler = delegate of obj * EventArrivedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 要为其调用此方法的对象的实例。

span.span: The instance of the object for which to invoke this method.
The that specifies the reason the event was invoked.

summary.span: 表示用来处理 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Examples 以下异步示例设置了一个 WMI 计时器，每秒引发一次事件，并在不再需要时将其删除。The following asynchronous example sets up a WMI timer to raise an event every second, and removes it when no longer needed. 定义几个 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 在传递 WMI 事件时引发的事件。The defines several [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] events which are raised when WMI events are delivered. 委托被附加到这些事件，以处理传入的数据。Delegates are attached to these events for handling the incoming data. [!code-csharp[wminet_EventArrivedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EventArrivedEventHandler/cs/EventArrivedEventHandler.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_EventArrivedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_EventArrivedEventHandler/vb/EventArrivedEventHandler.vb#1)]
